casebody.data:
FLORIDA, plaintiff,
v.
GEORGIA. No. 142, Original. Supreme Court of the United States April 3, 2017.

Motion of Special Master for allowance of fees and disbursements is granted, and the Special Master is awarded a total of $50,933.89, for the period January 1, 2017, through February 28, 2017, to be paid equally by the parties.
